name: UpdateGroupAttributes
description:
Replace a group's attributes with new values.

Use this tool to update all attributes of a specified group with new values in Airtable. Call this when a complete group update is necessary.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the group whose attributes need to be replaced.

parameters.name: new_group_attributes
parameters.description: JSON object containing new group attributes such as displayName, members, and schemas. Use this to replace all existing group attributes.

displayName.description: Becomes the displayName of the group in Airtable. It must not be in use already.

value.description: Represents the user ID of a group member

members.description: List of members of the group.

schemas.description: A list of schemas, including at least SCIM's core group schema URI.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the airtable API.

displayName.description: Becomes the displayName of the group in Airtable. It must not be in use already.

value.description: Represents the user ID of a group member

members.description: List of members of the group.

schemas.description: A list of schemas, including at least SCIM's core group schema URI.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
